data.title: LearnUpon
data.text:
Pentair E-Learning: This course will explore advanced hydraulics and will provide details on the cause and effect of cavitation. The course includes quizzing and a final exam. Read more

Pentair E-Learning: This course will introduce friction loss basics, showcase how friction loss can affect the system, and provide users with tools to calculate friction loss. The course designed for Pentair's agriculture and residential market, but the principles can be applied to any water system that deals with friction loss. The course includes quizzing and a final exam. Read more

Pentair E-Learning: During this training, you will review what a water tank is, its purpose, and how to properly size a water tank. This course includes a final exam. Read more

Pentair Recorded Webinar: The Electrical 101 webinar is an introduction focused on the well professional who may not have a lot of experience with electrical connections and troubleshooting. NOTE: This webinar is not intended to encourage anyone to be an electrician or to violate what their license permits. Pentair recommends that you always consult with a licensed electrician. Read more
